title: Oxford High School Shooting in Michigan Leaves Three Dead, Six Injured
sub_head: A suspect, a sophomore at the school, is in custody, police say
body:
Three people were killed and six others injured after a student opened fire at his Michigan high school Tuesday, law-enforcement officials said.
A 15-year-old sophomore at Oxford High School fired 15 to 20 shots from a semiautomatic handgun over about a five-minute period, according to police. The school is located in Oxford, Mich., about 40 miles north of Detroit.
